argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mgpbas.1 | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mgplem.2 | |- E = Slot N |
| 3 |  | mgplem.3 | |- N e. NN |
| 4 |  | mgplem.4 | |- N =/= 2 |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_ndxid | |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) |
| 6 | 2, 3 | #P_ndxarg | |- ( E ` ndx ) = N |
| 7 |  | #P_plusgndx | |- ( +g ` ndx ) = 2 |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_neeq12i | |- ( ( E ` ndx ) =/= ( +g ` ndx ) <-> N =/= 2 ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_mpbir | |- ( E ` ndx ) =/= ( +g ` ndx ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_setsnid | |- ( E ` R ) = ( E ` ( R sSet <. ( +g ` ndx ) , ( .r ` R ) >. ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_mgpval | |- M = ( R sSet <. ( +g ` ndx ) , ( .r ` R ) >. ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( E ` M ) = ( E ` ( R sSet <. ( +g ` ndx ) , ( .r ` R ) >. ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( E ` R ) = ( E ` M ) |
